statements: SELECT * FROM royalty_payments;
SELECT payment_id, artist_id, payment_amount FROM royalty_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT artist_id, payment_amount FROM royalty_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM royalty_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2021-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM royalty_payments WHERE record_label_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM royalty_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT artist_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM royalty_payments GROUP BY artist_id HAVING total_payment > 5000 ORDER BY total_payment DESC;
SELECT * FROM royalty_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, payment_date DESC;
SELECT artist_id, record_label_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM royalty_payments GROUP BY artist_id, record_label_id HAVING COUNT(artist_id) > 2 ORDER BY avg_payment DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM royalty_payments WHERE artist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM artists
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM artists
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, revenue_share FROM artists WHERE revenue_share > 0
SELECT * FROM record_labels
SELECT label_id, label_name, royalty_rate FROM record_labels ORDER BY royalty_rate DESC
SELECT artist_name, revenue_share FROM artists WHERE revenue_share > 1000 ORDER BY artist_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM record_labels WHERE royalty_rate < 0.5;
SELECT artist_name, SUM(revenue_share) AS total_revenue FROM artists GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT * FROM artists, record_labels WHERE artists.artist_id = record_labels.label_id;
SELECT artist_name, revenue_share FROM artists WHERE revenue_share BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM artist;
SELECT artist_name, date_of_birth FROM artist WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT label_name, headquarters_location FROM record_label WHERE headquarters_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT artist_name, payment_amount FROM artist JOIN royalty_payments ON artist.artist_id = royalty_payments.artist_id;

SELECT artist_name, label_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM artist JOIN royalty_payments ON artist.artist_id = royalty_payments.artist_id JOIN record_label ON royalty_payments.label_id = record_label.label_id;
SELECT * FROM artist INNER JOIN royalty_payments ON artist.artist_id = royalty_payments.artist_id;
SELECT artist_name, payment_amount FROM artist INNER JOIN royalty_payments ON artist.artist_id = royalty_payments.artist_id WHERE artist.date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT label_name, payment_amount FROM record_label INNER JOIN royalty_payments ON record_label.label_id = royalty_payments.label_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000;

SELECT artist_name, label_name, payment_amount FROM artist INNER JOIN royalty_payments ON artist.artist_id = royalty_payments.artist_id INNER JOIN record_label ON record_label.label_id = royalty_payments.label_id WHERE payment_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM artist WHERE artist_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM artist;
SELECT name, birth_date FROM artist ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT artist_id, genre FROM artist WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM song WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT label_id, name, foundation_date FROM record_label;
SELECT * FROM artist WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND birth_date >= '1980-01-01'
SELECT title, release_date FROM song WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT artist.name, record_label.name, revenue_sharing.revenue FROM artist JOIN revenue_sharing ON artist.artist_id = revenue_sharing.artist_id JOIN record_label ON revenue_sharing.label_id = record_label.label_id

SELECT artist.name AS artist_name, record_label.name AS label_name, share_percentage FROM artist JOIN revenue_sharing ON artist.artist_id = revenue_sharing.artist_id JOIN record_label ON revenue_sharing.label_id = record_label.label_id WHERE revenue_sharing.revenue > 100000

SELECT artist.name, record_label.name, song.title FROM artist JOIN revenue_sharing ON artist.artist_id = revenue_sharing.artist_id JOIN record_label ON revenue_sharing.label_id = record_label.label_id JOIN song ON revenue_sharing.song_id = song.song_id
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM artists WHERE artist_country = 'USA';
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT track_title, duration_minutes FROM tracks WHERE album_id = 1;
SELECT record_label_name, record_label_country FROM record_labels WHERE record_label_country = 'UK';
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE artist_country = 'USA';
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM artists ORDER BY artist_genre ASC;
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT track_title, duration_minutes FROM tracks ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre, album_title FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id ORDER BY artist_name ASC, album_title DESC;
